title: WhatsApp may use your phone number for non-marketing or administrative purposes

tosdr.case: pseudonym not allowed (user-to-user trust is relevant for service)
tosdr.tldr: WhatsApp may  use your mobile phone number (or email address, if provided) without further consent for non-marketing or administrative purposes (such as notifying you of major WhatsApp Site or WhatsApp Service changes or for customer service purposes).
